title: Track Awesome Mysql Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Mysql (shlomi-noach/awesome-mysql) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome MySQL software, libraries, tools and resources

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Mar 18, 2025
items.content_text:
### Security

*   [myldapsync (⭐0)](https://github.com/6eh01der/myldapsync) - Synchronize MySQL or MariaDB users with users in an LDAP directory.
items.content_html:
Security

  • myldapsync (⭐0) - Synchronize MySQL or MariaDB users with users in an LDAP directory.

items.content_html:
Connectors

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Jun 04, 2024
items.content_text:
### HA

*   [mha4mysql-node (⭐407)](https://github.com/yoshinorim/mha4mysql-node) and [mha4mysql-manager (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/yoshinorim/mha4mysql-manager) (both unmaintained) - Master High Availability Manager and tools for MySQL.
items.content_html:
HA

  • mha4mysql-node (⭐407) and mha4mysql-manager (⭐1.5k) (both unmaintained) - Master High Availability Manager and tools for MySQL.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Jun 03, 2024
items.content_text:
### Analysis

*   [Prometheus (⭐59k)](https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus)/[mysqld\_exporter (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/prometheus/mysqld_exporter) - Time series database for real-time monitoring and alerting.

### Benchmarking

*   [iibench-mysql (⭐46)](https://github.com/tmcallaghan/iibench-mysql) - Java based version of the Index Insertion Benchmark for MySQL/Percona/MariaDB.

### Connectors

*   [DBD::MariaDB (⭐35)](https://github.com/perl5-dbi/DBD-MariaDB) - MariaDB and MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
*   [DBD::mysql (⭐64)](https://github.com/perl5-dbi/DBD-mysql) - MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
*   [MariaDB Connector/J (⭐350)](https://github.com/mariadb-corporation/mariadb-connector-j) - LGPL-licensed MariaDB Client Library for Java Applications.
*   [MySQL C API](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/c-api/) - Official C driver for MySQL.
*   [MySQL Connector/C++ (⭐677)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-cpp) - Official C/C++ driver for MySQL.
*   [MySQL Connector/J (⭐964)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-j) - a standardized database driver for the Java platforms and development.
*   [MySQL Connector/NET (⭐309)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-net) - a standardized database driver for .Net platforms and development.
*   [MySQL Connector/Node.js (⭐158)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-nodejs) - Official Node.js driver for MySQL.
*   [MySQL Connector/Python (⭐913)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-python) - a standardized database driver for Python platforms and development.
*   [mysqlclient-python (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/PyMySQL/mysqlclient) - MySQL database connector for Python.
*   [PHP mysqlnd](https://www.php.net/manual/en/book.mysqlnd.php) - MySQL native driver for PHP.

### Deployment

*   [dbdeployer (⭐712)](https://github.com/datacharmer/dbdeployer) (archived) - A tool that installs one or more MySQL servers within seconds, easily, securely, and with full control.

### Development

*   [Flywaydb (⭐8.9k)](https://github.com/flyway/flyway) - Database migrations; Evolve your database schema easily and reliably across all your instances
*   [Liquibase (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/liquibase/liquibase) - Source control for your database
*   [Skeema (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/skeema/skeema) - Declarative pure-SQL schema management system for MySQL and MariaDB, with support for sharding and external online schema change tools
*   [SQLE (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/actiontech/sqle/blob/main/README_en.md) - SQLE is a SQL audit platform for DBA or developer

### GUI

*   [Adminer (⭐6.9k)](https://github.com/vrana/adminer/) - Database management in a single PHP file.
*   [DBeaver (⭐44k)](https://github.com/dbeaver/dbeaver/) - A cross-platform SQL and NoSQL database client.
*   [HeidiSQL (⭐5.3k)](https://github.com/HeidiSQL/HeidiSQL) - MySQL GUI frontend for Windows.
*   [MySQL Shell (⭐206)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-shell/) - Advanced client and code editor for MySQL that supports development and administration for the MySQL Server and MySQL InnoDB cluster (AdminAPI) with an interactive JavaScript, Python, or SQL interface.
*   [MySQL Workbench (⭐950)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-workbench) - provides DBAs and developers an integrated tools environment for database design & modeling; SQL devleopment; database administration.
*   [OmniDB: Web tool for database management (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/OmniDB/OmniDB)
*   [Percona Monitoring and Management (⭐797)](https://github.com/percona/pmm) - An open-source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL performance.
*   [phpMyAdmin (⭐7.6k)](https://github.com/phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin) - a free software tool written in PHP, intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web.

### HA

*   [Galera Cluster (⭐477)](https://github.com/codership/galera) - a true Multimaster Cluster based on synchronous replication.
*   [Orchestrator (⭐5.7k)](https://github.com/openark/orchestrator) - MySQL replication topology management and High Availability solution.

### Proxy

*   [MySQL Proxy (⭐425)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-proxy) (deprecated) - A simple program that sits between your client and MySQL server(s) that can monitor, analyze or transform their communication.
*   [ProxySQL (⭐6.3k)](https://github.com/sysown/proxysql) - High performance proxy for MySQL.

### Server

*   [Percona Server (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/percona/percona-server) - An enhanced, drop-in MySQL replacement.

### Sharding

*   [Jetpants (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/tumblr/jetpants) - An automation suite for managing large range sharding clusters, by Tumblr.
*   [Vitess (⭐20k)](https://github.com/vitessio/vitess) - vitess provides servers and tools which facilitate scaling of MySQL databases for large scale web services.

### Toolkits

*   [MySQL Utilities (⭐274)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-utilities) (deprecated) - a collection of command-line utilities, written in Python, that are used for maintaining and administering MySQL servers, either individually, or within Replication hierarchies.
*   [Percona Toolkit (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/percona/percona-toolkit) - a collection of advanced command-line tools to perform a variety of MySQL server and system tasks that are too difficult or complex to perform manually.
items.content_html:
Analysis

  • Prometheus (⭐59k)/mysqld_exporter (⭐2.3k) - Time series database for real-time monitoring and alerting.

Benchmarking

  • iibench-mysql (⭐46) - Java based version of the Index Insertion Benchmark for MySQL/Percona/MariaDB.

Connectors

  • DBD::MariaDB (⭐35) - MariaDB and MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
  • DBD::mysql (⭐64) - MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
  • MariaDB Connector/J (⭐350) - LGPL-licensed MariaDB Client Library for Java Applications.
  • MySQL C API - Official C driver for MySQL.
  • MySQL Connector/C++ (⭐677) - Official C/C++ driver for MySQL.
  • MySQL Connector/J (⭐964) - a standardized database driver for the Java platforms and development.
  • MySQL Connector/NET (⭐309) - a standardized database driver for .Net platforms and development.
  • MySQL Connector/Node.js (⭐158) - Official Node.js driver for MySQL.
  • MySQL Connector/Python (⭐913) - a standardized database driver for Python platforms and development.
  • mysqlclient-python (⭐2.5k) - MySQL database connector for Python.
  • PHP mysqlnd - MySQL native driver for PHP.

Deployment

  • dbdeployer (⭐712) (archived) - A tool that installs one or more MySQL servers within seconds, easily, securely, and with full control.

Development

  • Flywaydb (⭐8.9k) - Database migrations; Evolve your database schema easily and reliably across all your instances
  • Liquibase (⭐5.1k) - Source control for your database
  • Skeema (⭐1.3k) - Declarative pure-SQL schema management system for MySQL and MariaDB, with support for sharding and external online schema change tools
  • SQLE (⭐1.4k) - SQLE is a SQL audit platform for DBA or developer

GUI

  • Adminer (⭐6.9k) - Database management in a single PHP file.
  • DBeaver (⭐44k) - A cross-platform SQL and NoSQL database client.
  • HeidiSQL (⭐5.3k) - MySQL GUI frontend for Windows.
  • MySQL Shell (⭐206) - Advanced client and code editor for MySQL that supports development and administration for the MySQL Server and MySQL InnoDB cluster (AdminAPI) with an interactive JavaScript, Python, or SQL interface.
  • MySQL Workbench (⭐950) - provides DBAs and developers an integrated tools environment for database design & modeling; SQL devleopment; database administration.
  • OmniDB: Web tool for database management (⭐3.2k)
  • Percona Monitoring and Management (⭐797) - An open-source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL performance.
  • phpMyAdmin (⭐7.6k) - a free software tool written in PHP, intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web.

HA

  • Galera Cluster (⭐477) - a true Multimaster Cluster based on synchronous replication.
  • Orchestrator (⭐5.7k) - MySQL replication topology management and High Availability solution.

Proxy

  • MySQL Proxy (⭐425) (deprecated) - A simple program that sits between your client and MySQL server(s) that can monitor, analyze or transform their communication.
  • ProxySQL (⭐6.3k) - High performance proxy for MySQL.

Server

  • Percona Server (⭐1.2k) - An enhanced, drop-in MySQL replacement.

Sharding

  • Jetpants (⭐1.1k) - An automation suite for managing large range sharding clusters, by Tumblr.
  • Vitess (⭐20k) - vitess provides servers and tools which facilitate scaling of MySQL databases for large scale web services.

Toolkits

  • MySQL Utilities (⭐274) (deprecated) - a collection of command-line utilities, written in Python, that are used for maintaining and administering MySQL servers, either individually, or within Replication hierarchies.
  • Percona Toolkit (⭐1.3k) - a collection of advanced command-line tools to perform a variety of MySQL server and system tasks that are too difficult or complex to perform manually.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on May 30, 2024
items.content_text:
### Analysis

*   [MySQLTuner-perl (⭐9.2k)](https://github.com/major/MySQLTuner-perl) - A script that allows you to review a MySQL installation quickly and make adjustments to increase performance and stability.
*   [Wireshark](https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark/) - a protocol analyzer that can decode the MySQL protocol.

### Backup

*   [Percona Xtrabackup (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/percona/percona-xtrabackup) - an open-source hot backup utility for MySQL - based servers that doesn’t lock your database during the backup.

### Benchmarking

*   [TPCC-MySQL (⭐488)](https://github.com/Percona-Lab/tpcc-mysql) (archived) - A port of the popular [TPCC](http://www.tpc.org/tpcc/) benchmark for MySQL.

### GUI

*   [WebDB (⭐295)](https://github.com/WebDB-App/app) – Open Source and Efficient Database IDE. Featuring Easy server connection, Modern ERD, Intelligent data generator, AI assistant, NoSQL structure manager, Time machine and Powerful query editor

### Toolkits

*   [UnDROP (⭐404)](https://github.com/twindb/undrop-for-innodb) - a tool to recover data from dropped or corrupted InnoDB tables.
items.content_html:
Analysis

  • MySQLTuner-perl (⭐9.2k) - A script that allows you to review a MySQL installation quickly and make adjustments to increase performance and stability.
  • Wireshark - a protocol analyzer that can decode the MySQL protocol.

Backup

  • Percona Xtrabackup (⭐1.4k) - an open-source hot backup utility for MySQL - based servers that doesn’t lock your database during the backup.

Benchmarking

  • TPCC-MySQL (⭐488) (archived) - A port of the popular TPCC benchmark for MySQL.

GUI

  • WebDB (⭐295) – Open Source and Efficient Database IDE. Featuring Easy server connection, Modern ERD, Intelligent data generator, AI assistant, NoSQL structure manager, Time machine and Powerful query editor

Toolkits

  • UnDROP (⭐404) - a tool to recover data from dropped or corrupted InnoDB tables.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on May 29, 2024
items.content_text:
### Backup

*   [Dumpling (⭐39k)](https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/tree/master/dumpling) - Logical, parallel backup/dumper tool for MySQL/TiDB written in GoLang - support csv format output and integrated as library
*   [MyDumper (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/mydumper/mydumper) - Logical, parallel backup/dumper tool for MySQL

### Binlog-Replication

*   [DM (⭐438)](https://github.com/pingcap/tiflow) - A High-Availability data migration platform which supports migrating data from MySQL/MariaDB to TiDB and merging shard tables
*   [mysql-ripple (⭐375)](https://github.com/google/mysql-ripple) (archived) - Ripple, a server that can serve as a middleman in MySQL replication

### Connectors

*   [node-mysql](https://github.com/mysqljs/node) - A pure Nodejs Javascript client implementing the MySQL protocol.

### GUI

*   [SQLyog Community edition (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/webyog/sqlyog-community) - SQLyog Community edition. For Windows, works fine under wine in Mac and Linux

### Toolkits

*   [go-mysql (⭐4.8k)](https://github.com/go-mysql-org/go-mysql) - A pure go library to handle MySQL network protocol and replication.
items.content_html:
Backup

  • Dumpling (⭐39k) - Logical, parallel backup/dumper tool for MySQL/TiDB written in GoLang - support csv format output and integrated as library
  • MyDumper (⭐2.8k) - Logical, parallel backup/dumper tool for MySQL

Binlog-Replication

  • DM (⭐438) - A High-Availability data migration platform which supports migrating data from MySQL/MariaDB to TiDB and merging shard tables
  • mysql-ripple (⭐375) (archived) - Ripple, a server that can serve as a middleman in MySQL replication

Connectors

  • node-mysql - A pure Nodejs Javascript client implementing the MySQL protocol.

GUI

  • SQLyog Community edition (⭐2.3k) - SQLyog Community edition. For Windows, works fine under wine in Mac and Linux

Toolkits

  • go-mysql (⭐4.8k) - A pure go library to handle MySQL network protocol and replication.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Sep 26, 2023
items.content_text:
### HA

*   [Percona Replication Manager (⭐4)](https://github.com/percona/replication-manager) - Asynchronous MySQL replication manager agent for Pacemaker. Supports file and GTID based replication, geo-distributed clusters using booth.
items.content_html:
HA

  • Percona Replication Manager (⭐4) - Asynchronous MySQL replication manager agent for Pacemaker. Supports file and GTID based replication, geo-distributed clusters using booth.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Feb 03, 2023
items.content_text:
### GUI

*   [ILLA Cloud (⭐12k)](https://github.com/illacloud/illa-builder) - Low-code internal tool builder integrated with Mysql, can be used as GUI for Mysql.
items.content_html:
GUI

  • ILLA Cloud (⭐12k) - Low-code internal tool builder integrated with Mysql, can be used as GUI for Mysql.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Jun 23, 2022
items.content_text:
### Replication

*   [data-diff (⭐3k)](https://github.com/datafold/data-diff) - Command-line tool and Python library to efficiently diff rows across two different databases.
items.content_html:
Replication

  • data-diff (⭐3k) - Command-line tool and Python library to efficiently diff rows across two different databases.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Oct 06, 2021
items.content_text:
### GUI

*   [Sequel Ace (⭐7k)](https://github.com/Sequel-Ace/Sequel-Ace) - a Mac database management application for working with MySQL databases.
items.content_html:
GUI

  • Sequel Ace (⭐7k) - a Mac database management application for working with MySQL databases.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Sep 15, 2020
items.content_text:
### e-books

*   [Database Systems Lecture Notes](http://spots.augusta.edu/caubert/db/ln/) - lecture notes on Database Systems (available in pdf, html, odt and markdown) including a Chapter on SQL that covers basic set-up, exercises and problems.
items.content_html:
e-books

  • Database Systems Lecture Notes - lecture notes on Database Systems (available in pdf, html, odt and markdown) including a Chapter on SQL that covers basic set-up, exercises and problems.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Jul 30, 2020
items.content_text:
### Benchmarking

*   [go-tpc (⭐189)](https://github.com/pingcap/go-tpc) - A golang port of [TPCC](http://www.tpc.org/tpcc/) and [TPCH](http://www.tpc.org/tpch/) benchmark for MySQL.
items.content_html:
Benchmarking

  • go-tpc (⭐189) - A golang port of TPCC and TPCH benchmark for MySQL.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on May 31, 2019
items.content_text:
### Development

*   [Test database (⭐4.3k)](https://github.com/datacharmer/test_db) - A sample MySQL database with an integrated test suite, used to test applications and servers
items.content_html:
Development

  • Test database (⭐4.3k) - A sample MySQL database with an integrated test suite, used to test applications and servers

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Apr 08, 2019
items.content_text:
### Binlog-Replication

*   [Kingbus (⭐891)](https://github.com/flike/kingbus) - A distributed MySQL binlog storage system built on Raft
items.content_html:
Binlog-Replication

  • Kingbus (⭐891) - A distributed MySQL binlog storage system built on Raft

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Jan 26, 2019
items.content_text:
### Connectors

*   [mex-mariadb (⭐2)](https://github.com/markuman/mex-mariadb) - MIT licensed MariaDB/MySQL Client Library for GNU Octave and Matlab.
items.content_html:
Connectors

  • mex-mariadb (⭐2) - MIT licensed MariaDB/MySQL Client Library for GNU Octave and Matlab.

items.title: Awesome Mysql Updates on Dec 25, 2018
items.content_text:
### Analysis

*   [Anemometer (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/box/Anemometer) - Box SQL slow query monitor.
*   [innodb-ruby (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/jeremycole/innodb_ruby) - A parser for InnoDB file formats, in Ruby.
*   [innotop (⭐790)](https://github.com/innotop/innotop) - a 'top' clone for MySQL with many features and flexibility.
*   [MySQL Explain Analyzer (⭐95)](https://github.com/Preetam/explain-analyzer) - A web-based analyzer of `EXPLAIN FORMAT=JSON` output, providing comments, scalability analysis and permalinks for saved samples.
*   [mysql-statsd (⭐101)](https://github.com/db-art/mysql-statsd) - A Python daemon to collect information from MySQL and send it via StatsD to Graphite.
*   [pstop (⭐208)](https://github.com/sjmudd/ps-top) - a top-like program for MySQL, collecting, aggregating and displaying information from performance\_schema.

### Benchmarking

*   [Sysbench (⭐6.4k)](https://github.com/akopytov/sysbench) - a modular, cross-platform and multi-threaded benchmark tool.

### ChatOps

*   [Hubot MySQL ChatOps (⭐90)](https://github.com/samlambert/hubot-mysql-chatops)

### Configuration

*   [mysql-compatibility-config (⭐94)](https://github.com/morgo/mysql-compatibility-config) - make MySQL configuration behave more like newer (or older) releases of MySQL.

### Connectors

*   [go-sql-driver (⭐15k)](https://github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql) - a lightweight and fast MySQL-Driver for Go's (golang) database/sql package.
*   [libAttachSQL (⭐30)](https://github.com/libattachsql/libattachsql) - libAttachSQL is a lightweight, non-blocking C API for MySQL servers.
*   [PyMySQL (⭐7.8k)](https://github.com/PyMySQL/PyMySQL) - MySQL database connector for Python.
*   [Ruby Mysql2 gem (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/brianmario/mysql2) - MySQL driver for Ruby and Rails projects.

### Deployment

*   [MySQL Docker](https://hub.docker.com/_/mysql/) - Official Docker images.

### Development

*   [Shift (⭐741)](https://github.com/square/shift) - An application that helps you run schema migrations on MySQL databases

### GUI

*   [mycli (⭐12k)](https://github.com/dbcli/mycli) - A Terminal Client for MySQL with AutoCompletion and Syntax Highlighting.
*   [Ocelot GUI (⭐62)](https://github.com/ocelot-inc/ocelotgui) - GUI client for MySQL or MariaDB, including debugger.
*   [pspg (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/okbob/pspg) - provides a pager with enhanced visualization and navigation for tabular data. Originally implemented for PostgreSQL, but also supports MySQL.

### HA

*   [replication-manager (⭐689)](https://github.com/signal18/replication-manager) - a high availability solution to manage MariaDB 10.x and MySQL & Percona Server 5.7 GTID replication topologies.

### Proxy

*   [MySQL Router](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-router/en/) - MySQL Router is part of InnoDB cluster, and is a lightweight middleware that provides transparent routing between your application and back-end MySQL Servers.

### Schema

*   [common\_schema (⭐128)](https://github.com/shlomi-noach/common_schema) - DBA's framework for MySQL, providing a function library, views library and QueryScript interpreter.
*   [sys (⭐830)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-sys) - A collection of views, functions and procedures to help MySQL administrators get insight in to MySQL Database usage.

### Security

*   [Acra (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/cossacklabs/acra) - SQL database protection suite: strong selective encryption, SQL injections prevention, intrusion detection system.

### Server

*   [MariaDB (⭐6.2k)](https://github.com/MariaDB/server) - Community developed fork of MySQL server.
*   [MySQL Server & MySQL Cluster (⭐12k)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-server) - Official Oracle's MySQL server & MySQL Cluster distribution.
*   [TiDB (⭐39k)](https://github.com/pingcap/tidb) - A distributed HTAP database compatible with the MySQL protocol.

### Toolkits

*   [gh-ost (⭐13k)](https://github.com/github/gh-ost/) - GitHub's online schema migration for MySQL.

### e-books

*   [SQL-exercise (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/XD-DENG/SQL-exercise) - contains several SQL exercises, including the schema description figure, SQL code to build schema, questions and solutions in SQL. Based on wikibook [SQL Exercises](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/SQL_Exercises).
items.content_html:
Analysis

  • Anemometer (⭐1.4k) - Box SQL slow query monitor.
  • innodb-ruby (⭐1.7k) - A parser for InnoDB file formats, in Ruby.

  • mysql-statsd (⭐101) - A Python daemon to collect information from MySQL and send it via StatsD to Graphite.
  • pstop (⭐208) - a top-like program for MySQL, collecting, aggregating and displaying information from performance_schema.

Benchmarking

  • Sysbench (⭐6.4k) - a modular, cross-platform and multi-threaded benchmark tool.

  • libAttachSQL (⭐30) - libAttachSQL is a lightweight, non-blocking C API for MySQL servers.
  • PyMySQL (⭐7.8k) - MySQL database connector for Python.
  • Ruby Mysql2 gem (⭐2.3k) - MySQL driver for Ruby and Rails projects.

Deployment

  • MySQL Docker - Official Docker images.

Development

  • Shift (⭐741) - An application that helps you run schema migrations on MySQL databases

GUI

  • mycli (⭐12k) - A Terminal Client for MySQL with AutoCompletion and Syntax Highlighting.
  • Ocelot GUI (⭐62) - GUI client for MySQL or MariaDB, including debugger.
  • pspg (⭐2.6k) - provides a pager with enhanced visualization and navigation for tabular data. Originally implemented for PostgreSQL, but also supports MySQL.

HA

  • replication-manager (⭐689) - a high availability solution to manage MariaDB 10.x and MySQL & Percona Server 5.7 GTID replication topologies.

Proxy

  • MySQL Router - MySQL Router is part of InnoDB cluster, and is a lightweight middleware that provides transparent routing between your application and back-end MySQL Servers.

Schema

  • common_schema (⭐128) - DBA's framework for MySQL, providing a function library, views library and QueryScript interpreter.
  • sys (⭐830) - A collection of views, functions and procedures to help MySQL administrators get insight in to MySQL Database usage.

Security

  • Acra (⭐1.4k) - SQL database protection suite: strong selective encryption, SQL injections prevention, intrusion detection system.

Server

  • MariaDB (⭐6.2k) - Community developed fork of MySQL server.
  • MySQL Server & MySQL Cluster (⭐12k) - Official Oracle's MySQL server & MySQL Cluster distribution.
  • TiDB (⭐39k) - A distributed HTAP database compatible with the MySQL protocol.

Toolkits

  • gh-ost (⭐13k) - GitHub's online schema migration for MySQL.

e-books

  • SQL-exercise (⭐1.4k) - contains several SQL exercises, including the schema description figure, SQL code to build schema, questions and solutions in SQL. Based on wikibook SQL Exercises.
